metadata.feature_description: Allows users to subscribe to files and folders for notifications on changes

steps.action: Navigate to Assets module and select 'My Website' folder
steps.expected: Assets panel should display files and folders
steps.actual: Assets panel displayed with folders and files visible

steps.action: Hover over 'cavalier-logo.png' file to reveal action buttons
steps.expected: Action buttons (edit, move, copy, download, delete) should appear
steps.actual: Action buttons appeared on hover including edit button

steps.action: Click edit button to open file details panel
steps.expected: File details panel should open showing Subscribe toggle in Off state
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Subscribe toggle showing 'Off'

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to enable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle should change to 'On' state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to 'On' (blue toggle), subscription enabled

steps.action: Navigate to 'Images' folder and click edit button
steps.expected: Folder details panel should open with Subscribe toggle
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened showing Subscribe toggle in 'On' state (already subscribed)

steps.action: Toggle subscription off and then back on
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle should change from Off to On
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle successfully changed from Off to On

steps.action: Open file details for 'cavalier-logo.png' (which was subscribed earlier)
steps.actual: File showed Subscribe toggle as 'On', confirming subscription persistence

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to disable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle should change to 'Off' state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to 'Off' (gray toggle), subscription disabled

steps.action: In folder details panel, click Subscribe toggle to disable
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle should change to 'Off' state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to 'Off' (gray toggle), folder unsubscribed

steps.action: Close file details panel and reopen it
steps.actual: When reopening file details, the Subscribe toggle retained its state, confirming persistence

observations: The subscription feature is implemented as a toggle switch in the file/folder details panel
Subscription changes are immediately sent to the server via API calls (Subscribe/Unsubscribe endpoints)
A minor error occurred when accessing folder permissions ('Could not load type Dnn.PersonaBar.Library.Dto.Permissions'), but this did not affect subscription functionality
The feature works consistently for both files and folders
Notification delivery was not directly testable through the UI as it requires actual content changes to trigger notifications
